name: visitor
title: Visitor

web_form_fields.label: To be completed by all visitors
Please answer to the following questions:
Have you ever had or are you known to be a carrier of, enteric fever, typhoid or paratyphoid in last 3 months ?
Have you now, or have you suffered from diarrhea and/or vomiting over the last seven days ?
Have you been abroad in the last three weeks?
At present are you suffering from:
web_form_fields.options:
None
Skin trouble affecting hands, arms or face
Burnes or wounds
Discharge from eye, ear or gums/mouth

web_form_fields.label: Do you suffer from
web_form_fields.options:
None
A chronic skin or ear trouble
A chronic gastrointestinal disorder
